title: Logo Font Advice
content:
Hi people, although i have been hovering around for a good few months this is my first post.

I have recently purchased the Lazy Apes(.com) domain, with intention to venture on the similar titled venture.

I have started designing the logo which should convey , young, hip, cool, on the fly, student-like, computer and design aware...

I am happy with the monkey but not sure about the font.

can i get a witness?

comments.content: Your monkey is active, not lazy. As far as the style — try silhouette.

I hear you david.

there is a point about the ape, although i like it and might keep it.

my real issue is with the font.

Thanks for the advice.

“should convey , young, hip, cool, on the fly, student-like, computer and design aware...”

To be blunt, that logo says just the opposite of all those descriptors. I’d try and come up with some more options.

Do you reckon really Aluminium?

I would not think so, but i am open to for suggestions

Arial Black.

’Cause nothin’ says lazy like Arial.

or more constructively, maybe someling like Belin Sans FB or Belin Sans FB Demi.

The ape needs work.
